snippet: Coach jumped 6 percent after it reported earnings that beat analysts’ estimates, while Allstate sank nearly 12 percent after its results came up short.
abstract: Stocks decline for third consecutive day as investors react to disappointing earnings reports.
lead_paragraph: Coach jumped 6 percent after it reported earnings that beat analysts’ estimates, while Allstate sank nearly 12 percent after its results came up short.

headline.main: Disenchantment With Some Earnings Reports Pulls Markets Down
headline.print_headline: Disenchantment With Some Earnings Reports Pulls Markets Down
